vistra.app.view.component.mouse

Class PopupPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.AbstractGraphMousePlugin
      • edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.AbstractPopupGraphMousePlugin
        • edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.EditingPopupGraphMousePlugin<ILayoutVertex,ILayoutEdge>
          • vistra.app.view.component.mouse.PopupPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.GraphMousePlugin, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class PopupPlugin
extends edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.EditingPopupGraphMousePlugin<ILayoutVertex,ILayoutEdge>
    An adapted JUNG mouse plugin that uses popup menus to create vertices and edges.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
